snippet: Ms. Yellen, the central bank’s No. 2, has the stature and wisdom for the top job. Mr. Summers championed the deregulation that caused the 2008 financial crisis.
abstract: Ms. Yellen, the central bank’s No. 2, has the stature and wisdom for the top job. Mr. Summers championed the deregulation that caused the 2008 financial crisis.

headline.main: Why Janet Yellen, Not Larry Summers, Should Lead the Fed
headline.print_headline: Why Janet Yellen, Not Larry Summers, Should Lead the Fed
